subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Giants left guard and occasional tight end Rich Seubert, whose name is announced about 20 times per game because of a quirky football rule, has emerged as a sort of cult hero at Giants Stadium.
snippet: Giants left guard and occasional tight end Rich Seubert, whose name is announced about 20 times per game because of a quirky football rule, has emerged as a sort of cult hero at Giants Stadium.
